short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eduvision is the trusted education platform for the management, hosting, and distribution of video delivery, both live and on-demand

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eduvision Capture lets users capture and record video and audio directly from their
desktop using your web browser. Following the initial sign-in, the user selects
their default settings for the recording channel, automatic captions,
translations, public and private settings, and video availability dates.      

Eduvision Capture allows for an entire screen, tab, or window recording with the option for a web camera or web camera placed on the desktop, which can be moved during a pause and resized. A moving audio icon and red recording icon provide confidence your recording is active.
The controls and interface are powerful because it's simple and easy to use.

Following the recording, the user can access Eduvision Studio for trimming, bookmarking,
editing captions, and adding quizzes and polls. Additionally, the user can get
direct video links, embed codes for external sharing, or use Eduvisions Learning
Technology Integration for your choice of LMS platforms. The quiz results can
also auto-synchronize with your LMS grade book.
